entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Showers beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
